Gardabani / Georgia

230MW Gardabani Power Plant Project

  • Gardabani Power Plant is Georgia's first natural gas combined cycling plant, as well as biggest investment project in Georgia. As part of this project we have erected 2 Nooter Eriksen Waste Heat Steam Boilers
